name: Overwind
description:
Are you  a self starter, a real go-getter? Are you up to date with the latest advancements in analog video cassettes? Do you have what it takes to become a video master? If so, you may qualify for a position at ACE Video Store!

Come be a founding member of our new night-owl crew! Blast through our stock of returned videos and rewind them like a champ, to ensure the best shopping experience for our customers.

  • Flip, sort, and shelve as you race to finish before your shift ends!
  • Get paid for each tape you process!*
  • Get hands on experience with top-of-the-line equipment!
  • Short work engagement, and good pay!
  • NO EXPERIENCE REQUIRED!

Be sure to leave us lots of feedback to improve our employee experience! This a new, experimental position, so we apologize for any inconveniences you may encounter on the job. Good luck!

*(Employees will be billed for any damage to our inventory)

====== [] ======

Controls:

  • [Arrow Keys] OR [WASD] to flip VHS tapes
  • {Left Click] for pretty much everything else

I'd recommend going through story mode first, as it introduces all the game mechanics individually.
